name: Crabbed or Alive
description:
Made for GMTK Jam.

The theme of the jam  was Dual Purpose Design. You can shoot enemies with your gun as well as reflect their bullets. Shooting multiple enemies without lowering your gun gives you more bullets, and bullets are also your score points.

We had more interesting ideas for dual purpose mechanics, but we had no time to implement them, sadly!

Platforms:

Windows, Mac

Third-party assets:

Unity Engine
https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/96632/
https://freesound.org/people/J.Zazvurek/sounds/73583/
https://freesound.org/people/Rock%20Savage/sounds/58906/
